Hola!

I am Sergio de las Heras, doctoral researcher at the [Technical Psychoacoustics Group](https://www.aalto.fi/en/department-of-information-and-communications-engineering/technical-psychoacoustics) in the [Aalto Acoustics Lab](https://www.aalto.fi/en/aalto-acoustics-lab) under the supervision of [Prof. Johannes M. Arend](https://www.aalto.fi/en/people/johannes-m-arend) and [Nils Meyer-Kahlen, PhD](https://www.aalto.fi/en/people/nils-daniel-meyer-kahlen). I am interested in sound perception in Virtual and Augmented Reality, perception of room acoustics, and human centered audio research.
